Road Kilometerage-Northern-Class A.Note: “A” Class – All roads within the network of Trunk Roads connecting the national capital with the provincial capitals and also connecting these capitals with one another. Also included are other major roads (all roads paved and bitumen surfaced with carriage way between 24ft. to 36ft. and platform width 36ft. to 56ft.).

Road Kilometerage-Northern-Class B.Note: “B” Class – Main roads connecting other important towns and also providing important links within the trunk route system (Metalled and bitumen with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-Northern-Class C.Note: “C” Class – Other roads such as agricultural roads and local roads (Single carriage way of 12ft. width and a platform width of 22ft. mostly metalled but with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-Northern-Class D.Note: “D” Class – Gravelled road with 8ft. – 10ft. width surface generally motorable during dry weather only.

Road Kilometerage-North Western-Class A.Note: “A” Class – All roads within the network of Trunk Roads connecting the national capital with the provincial capitals and also connecting these capitals with one another. Also included are other major roads (all roads paved and bitumen surfaced with carriage way between 24ft. to 36ft. and platform width 36ft. to 56ft.).

Road Kilometerage-North Western-Class B.Note: “B” Class – Main roads connecting other important towns and also providing important links within the trunk route system (Metalled and bitumen with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-North Western-Class C.Note: “C” Class – Other roads such as agricultural roads and local roads (Single carriage way of 12ft. width and a platform width of 22ft. mostly metalled but with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-North Western-Class D.Note: “D” Class – Gravelled road with 8ft. – 10ft. width surface generally motorable during dry weather only.

Road Kilometerage-North Central-Class D.Note: “D” Class – Gravelled road with 8ft. – 10ft. width surface generally motorable during dry weather only.

Road Kilometerage-Nuwara Eliya-Class A.Note: “A” Class – All roads within the network of Trunk Roads connecting the national capital with the provincial capitals and also connecting these capitals with one another. Also included are other major roads (all roads paved and bitumen surfaced with carriage way between 24ft. to 36ft. and platform width 36ft. to 56ft.).

Road Kilometerage-Nuwara Eliya-Class B.Note: “B” Class – Main roads connecting other important towns and also providing important links within the trunk route system (Metalled and bitumen with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-Nuwara Eliya-Class C.Note: “C” Class – Other roads such as agricultural roads and local roads (Single carriage way of 12ft. width and a platform width of 22ft. mostly metalled but with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-Nuwara Eliya-Class D.Note: “D” Class – Gravelled road with 8ft. – 10ft. width surface generally motorable during dry weather only.

Road Kilometerage-Polonnaruwa-Class A.Note: “A” Class – All roads within the network of Trunk Roads connecting the national capital with the provincial capitals and also connecting these capitals with one another. Also included are other major roads (all roads paved and bitumen surfaced with carriage way between 24ft. to 36ft. and platform width 36ft. to 56ft.).

Road Kilometerage-Polonnaruwa-Class B.Note: “B” Class – Main roads connecting other important towns and also providing important links within the trunk route system (Metalled and bitumen with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-Polonnaruwa-Class C.Note: “C” Class – Other roads such as agricultural roads and local roads (Single carriage way of 12ft. width and a platform width of 22ft. mostly metalled but with a small percentage gravelled).

Road Kilometerage-Polonnaruwa-Class D.Note: “D” Class – Gravelled road with 8ft. – 10ft. width surface generally motorable during dry weather only.

Road Kilometerage-Northern-Class E.Note: “E” Class – Briddle paths, generally unmotorable but some are jeepable.

Road Kilometerage-North Western-Class E.Note: “E” Class – Briddle paths, generally unmotorable but some are jeepable.

Road Kilometerage-North Central-Class E.Note: “E” Class – Briddle paths, generally unmotorable but some are jeepable.

Road Kilometerage-Nuwara Eliya-Class E.Note: “E” Class – Briddle paths, generally unmotorable but some are jeepable.

Road Kilometerage-Polonnaruwa-Class E.Note: “E” Class – Briddle paths, generally unmotorable but some are jeepable.
